workflow.filterInfo1: Same Filter = Sequential: Workflows with the same transaction code filter run in order (1 → 2 → 3)
workflow.filterInfo2: Different Filters = Independent: Workflows with different filters run separately based on transaction code
workflow.filterInfo3a: 3 workflows filtered to "FAR Only" → Run sequentially for FAR transactions
workflow.filterInfo3b: 1 workflow filtered to "DFR Only" → Runs independently for DFR transactions
